item.title: 中国金融公司的香港员工面临退薪
item.description: 中国一些最大的国有金融企业要求香港员工退还部分工资，将习近平主席的 "共同富裕 "运动扩展到了这个离岸商业中心。【原文：Some of China’s largest state-backed financial firms are asking employees in Hong Kong to return a portion of their pay, extending President Xi Jinping’s “common prosperity” campaign to the offshore business hub.】

item.title: 新加坡称仍在通缉 1MDB 案逃犯刘在石
item.description: 新加坡当局表示仍在追捕马来西亚逃犯 Low Taek Jho，他与 1Malaysia Development Bhd 涉及数十亿美元的丑闻有关。【原文：Singapore authorities said it is still pursuing Malaysian fugitive Low Taek Jho in connection with a multibillion-dollar scandal related to 1Malaysia Development Bhd.】

item.title: 德意志银行 2019 年财务报告遭监督机构批评
item.description: 据一份新闻稿称，德国监管机构发现德意志银行股份公司几年前提交的一份财务报告中存在缺陷。【原文：A German watchdog has identified a deficiency in a financial report filed by Deutsche Bank AG several years ago, according to a release.】

item.title: 英国食品杂货通胀率降至近三年最低
item.description: 在英国央行下月做出是否降息的关键决定之前，食品价格通胀率降至 2021 年 9 月以来的最低水平，进一步表明成本压力有所缓解。【原文：Grocery price inflation fell to its lowest level since September 2021 in a further sign of easing cost pressures, ahead of a crucial decision by the Bank of England next month on whether to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 英国水务监管机构将调查另外四家污水泄漏公司
item.description: 英国水务监管机构 Ofwat 将对另外四家公司提起执法诉讼，以调查它们泄漏污水的频率。【原文：UK water regulator Ofwat will open enforcement cases against four more companies to probe how often they’re spilling sewage.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Segantii 退还了超过 90% 的客户资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 已返还了超过 90% 的客户资金，而这距离该对冲基金公司告诉投资者将返还资金还不到两个月。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd. has returned more than 90% of its client capital, according to people familiar with the matter, less than two months after the hedge-fund firm told investors that it would give them back their money.】

item.title: 历峰集团在中国市场销售额下降，但仍达到预期目标
item.description: 历峰集团（Richemont SA）第一季度的销售额达到了分析师的预期，尽管中国市场的销售额和对其奢侈手表的需求有所下降。【原文：Richemont SA met analysts’ sales estimates in the first quarter, despite declines in China sales and demand for its luxury watches.】

item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一 Rest 向 Metrics Credit Partners 的房地产私人信贷基金投资了 4 亿澳元（2.7 亿美元）。【原文：Rest, one of Australia’s largest pension funds, has invested A$400 million ($270 million) in Metrics Credit Partners’ real estate private credit fund.】

item.title: 中国制造业增速连续三个季度超过经济增速
item.description: 中国制造业增速连续第三个季度超过整体经济增速，凸显了工业和出口对世界第二大经济体增长的推动作用。【原文：China’s manufacturing sector grew faster than the overall economy for a third quarter in a row, underscoring how industry and exports are driving growth in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 香港业主为填补空置写字楼支付更高的中介费
item.description: 随着开发商努力填补这个亚洲金融中心的空置商业空间，香港的亿万富翁业主正在向中介支付更高的佣金，以招揽写字楼租户。【原文：Hong Kong’s billionaire landlords are paying agents larger commissions for bringing in office tenants as developers struggle to fill empty commercial space in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在缴税和关注利率之际大幅注资
item.description: 中国央行通过日常操作向银行系统注入了自一月份以来最多的现金，以便在纳税额增加和国家领导人开会制定经济议程之际保持充裕的流动性。【原文：China’s central bank injected the most amount of cash to its banking system since January via its daily operations, to keep liquidity plentiful as tax payments mount and the country’s leaders meet to set the economic agenda.】

item.title: 沃达丰 Idea 可能迎来更多好消息
印度 L&T 公司评级提升，有望赢得更多全球订单
item.description: 印度最大的工程和建筑公司拉森-土布罗有限公司（Larsen & Toubro Ltd.）在获得高于主权国家的全球信用评级后，预计其国际业务将得到提振，而国内市场则会放缓。【原文：India’s largest engineering and construction company Larsen & Toubro Ltd. expects its international business to get a boost while domestic market slows, after receiving global credit ratings higher than the sovereign’s.】

item.title: 瑞银称美国征收 60% 关税将使中国增长率减半
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的最新研究显示，对所有中国输美产品征收 60% 的新关税将使中国的年增长率减半以上，这凸显了如果前总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，中国政府将面临的风险。【原文：New tariffs of 60% on all Chinese exports to the US would more than halve China’s annual growth rate, according to new research from UBS Group AG, underscoring the risks for Beijing if former President Donald Trump returns to the White House.】

item.title: 印度韦丹塔公司通过配股募集 6 亿美元资金
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的交易条款，印度矿业公司韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd. ）将向机构投资者发售最多 1.14 亿股股票。【原文：Indian mining company Vedanta Ltd. is offering up to 114 million shares to institutional investors, according to terms of the deal obtained by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 铜市最大鲸鱼引发重大转变猜想
item.description: 几个月来，随着铜价飙升到创纪录的水平，然后再次回落，一个关键问题在整个金属行业悄然出现：中国的国家电网运营商在搞什么鬼？【原文：For months, as copper spiked to record levels and then fell back down again, one key question has bubbled up across the metals industry: What is China’s state grid operator up to?】

item.title: 普拉博沃吓跑债券投资者，财务总监风险增大
item.description: 印尼震荡的债券市场的命运很可能取决于当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）选择谁担任其财政部长。【原文：The fate of Indonesia’s jittery bond market may well hinge on who President-elect Prabowo Subianto chooses as his finance minister.】

item.title: 香港授权银行发行多种货币的绿色债券
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，香港已规定银行销售三种货币的绿色钞票。【原文：Hong Kong has mandated banks to sell green notes in three currencies, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储中枢赌注升温，黄金逼近历史纪录
item.description: 由于交易商加大了对美国联邦储备委员会今年将降息三次的押注，黄金走高至略低于历史纪录。【原文：Gold edged higher to just below a record as traders added to bets the US Federal Reserve will cut interest rates three times this year.】

item.title: 绝对能源公司寻求合作伙伴；评级因欺诈调查被下调
item.description: 陷入困境的泰国可再生能源公司 Energy Absolute Pcl 表示，在其信用评级因欺诈调查被下调至垃圾级后，该公司正在寻求合作伙伴，帮助其偿还 2024 年到期的 195 亿泰铢（5.39 亿美元）债务。【原文：Energy Absolute Pcl, the embattled Thai renewables firm, said it’s seeking a partner to help it with 19.5 billion baht ($539 million) of debt due in 2024, after its credit rating was cut to junk due to a fraud probe.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂为重要废金属短缺做准备
item.description: 由于中国政府为创造公平竞争环境所做的努力产生了意想不到的减少供应的效果，中国的铜冶炼厂正在为潜在的废金属短缺做准备。【原文：Chinese copper smelters are bracing for a potential shortage of scrap metal as Beijing’s efforts to create a level playing field have the unintended effect of reducing supply.】
